title: Bytedance - Global Payments Team
subtitle: Fullstack Engineer Intern
body:
● Architected and implemented Elastic Search functionality for an established relational database, decreasing search time by up to 1/4
● Implemented the Feedback system from the ground up for a Document Management System used by external merchants

title: Google Developer Student Clubs NUS - Project Juniors Club
subtitle: Tech Lead
body: ● Spearheading a team of 7 software developers to build a Learning Management System for Food Bank to digitalise their in-person teaching programmes.

title: Google Developer Student Clubs NUS - Project Siew Dai
subtitle: Fullstack Engineer
body:
● Developed a Stakeholder Management System for Diabetes Singapore to digitalise thousands of data entries from their members, volunteers and event participants previously recorded on physical documents.
● Saved over 4k lines of code by abstracting multiple pages into a single generic component using Typescript generics and union types, improving code readability and maintainability.

title: Computing for Voluntary Welfare Organisations (CVWO)
subtitle: Fullstack Engineer Intern
body:
● Built a Case Management System for Lions Befrienders Cluster Support Programme to track case work previously done manually with Word documents/Excel sheets used by hundreds of Befrienders
● Migrated frontend for Case Management System for Care Corner from a legacy server-rendered view with Ruby on Rails to a new client-side rendering with React, improving the UX and performance for hundreds of staff

title: 17th STePS NUS SoC Project Showcase
subtitle: Student Leader
body:
● Led and organised the event comprising of more than 1700 registered guests showcasing 70 innovative projects. 
● Responsible for liaising with various sponsors and ensuring that their requests are met before and during the event.
